doc:
Charles Brown (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Brown_(actor) 0 Charles Brown (January 15, 1946 – January 8, 2004) was an American actor and a member of New York City, New York theater troupe the Negro Ensemble Company. He was best known for his performances in Off-Broadway and Broadway plays by Samm-Art Williams and August Wilson. Charles_Brown ( January_15_,_1946 – January_8_,_2004 ) was an_American_actor and a_member of New_York_City , New_York_theater troupe the_Negro_Ensemble_Company . He was_best_known for his_performances in Off-Broadway_and_Broadway plays by Samm-Art_Williams_and_August_Wilson .
